info.headline: Fire Warning issued April 04 at 4:59PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN AMARILLO HAS ISSUED A FIRE WARNING AT THE REQUEST OF AMARILLO OEM FOR POTTER COUNTY. * AT 456 PM CDT...A DANGEROUS WILDFIRE WAS LOCATED 6 MILES EAST OF VALLEY DE ORO...OR 18 MILES NORTHWEST OF AMARILLO...MOVING RAPIDLY EAST-NORTHEAST AT 3 TO 4 MPH. * AREAS IMPACTED... TIERRA GRANDE IS THREATENED BY THIS FIRE. * ADDITIONAL INFORMATION... THIS FIRE IS APPROACHING HIGHWAY 287 BETWEEN MASTERSON AND AMARILLO. $$ WEBER/VANDEN BOSCH
info.instruction: BE PREPARED TO EVACUATE QUICKLY IF REQUESTED AND FOLLOW ALL SAFETY INSTRUCTIONS FROM LOCAL EMERGENCY MANAGEMENT OFFICIALS. DO NOT DRIVE INTO SMOKE. FIREFIGHTERS AND INCIDENT RESPONDERS SHOULD ANTICIPATE EXTREME FIRE BEHAVIOR INCLUDING A WIND-DRIVEN AND TORCHING FIRE.
